attributes.action: Raise the sentence for getting caught carrying a bladed article
attributes.additional_details: I want the goverment to change the laws on knife crime
attributes.background: I want the goverment to raise the sentence on being caught carrying a knife no matter what the reason

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition:

Any crime involving a knife to get a minimum 10 year custodial sentence: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711379
